name: Monster Seek Ep.1
description:
Learning is a light, but not everywhere
In the first episode, the genius scientist finally set the time machine in action, and decides to go back in time to make his life's dream come true. But in the place where he got to everything happens contrary to historical realities and the expectations of the scientist. Old and not too agile professor is forced to overcome dangers, seek shelter and change his well-established outlook on life. At the end of the episode, the scientist's story is just beginning.

  • 16 unique locations through which you need to guide the scientist.
  • An unfriendly nasty scientist can only arouse sympathy.
  • Run and hide from the monsters that have filled the scientist's world. Solve puzzles and find the best paths to complete the levels.
  • Drawn, developed and voiced by one person, inspired by the best games in the genre.
